name: Strange Knights
description:
StrangeKnights Alpha engine-test (0.0.1)

Greetings! This is an early access engine test of the game StrangeKnights. If you purchase now ($1), you will receive this alpha and all updates of the game. This engine test is to help find bugs and get feedback on the early state of the game. Still lots of bugs, it should be stable within a week or two. Thanks!

Set in an ever-changing randomized dream world, our hero is lost, almost overtaken by nightmares. Can you defeat the source of the corruption?
